data.title: June 2021 – Claire Voyant
data.text:
Songs that fit the vibes of the Avengers in Age of Ultron

Bruce Banner (The Hulk)- Lover/loner by nightly ~The lyrics in this song is definitely why I chose it. I mean talking about the ‘other guy’ and being lonely, it literally screams dr. Banner~

Tony Stark (Ironman)- Up town funk by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars ~I love this song comes in my head every time I see Tony being sarcastic with Pepper or working on one of his projects~

Clint Barton (Hawkeye)- Home by Micheal Bublé ~I keep thinking that this is what Clint says to himself everytime and just like the song he longs to go home to his wife and kids~

Wanda Maximoff (Scarlet Witch)- Stand in the rain by Superchick ~I love the beat and tone of this vibe and the lyrics definitely Wanda. I feel like nobody actually acknowledges how much pain she’s actually been through ~

Steve Rogers (Captain America)- See You Again by Wiz Khalifa ft. Charlie Puth ~this one is obviously about Steve and Bucky and their lost friendship ~

Natasha Romanoff (Black Widow)- Castle by Halsey ~I just discovered this song recently and wow Black Widow vibes. It’s so powerful and dark and mysterious, the tone is definitely so Natasha ~

Sam Wilson (The Falcon)- Louisiana Hero by Henry Jackman ~I think it’s pretty obvious why I chose this song ;)~

Thor Odinson (Thor)- Thunderstruck AC/DC ~ Okay to be honest I didn’t have to think about this for too long ~
